Shop BJJ Gis

Find the Perfect Gi for Your Jiu Jitsu Journey!

Our extensive selection of BJJ gis has something for everyone. Whether you're a new practitioner buying your first gi, or looking for the perfect lightweight training gi, or the ultimate competition gi - we have it. Browse our collection and find the best BJJ gi to meet your training needs.

Explore Our Collection: Shop BJJ Gis

Understanding BJJ Gis

It's important to note that not all gis are the same. The BJJ gis is different from other martial arts uniforms, and is crafted specifically for the dynamic movements and physical nature of Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. We have Gis designed for every type of practitioner:

  • Basic Gis: Perfect for beginners, these Gis are affordable and durable, making them ideal for those just starting their Jiu Jitsu journey.
  • All Around Gis: Like the title says, these are designed for whatever you throw at them. These Gis are versatile enough for both daily training and competition.
  • Lightweight Gis: Ideal for competitors or those who prefer training with less bulk. Lightweight BJJ Gis are easy to move in and keep you cool during training.
  • Competition Specific Gis: Designed to meet IBJJF regulations, our competition Gis are not only designed to meet IBJJF standards, but they are also lightweight, making weigh-ins a breeze.

Not sure about which gi to choose? We'd be happy to recommend something, just shoot us an email or hop on our live chat!

BJJ Gi FAQ's

How Fast Will My Order Ship?

Most in-stock orders are processed and shipped same day if your order is placed before 1pm EST. Free shipping to the lower 48 states on all gis over $115.

How do I choose the right BJJ Gi?

Consider your training frequency, Gi material, weight, and your academy's guidelines. Each Gi in our collection comes with a detailed sizing chart to help you find the best fit.

What color BJJ Gi should I get?

While white, blue, and black are the standard BJJ gi colors. While we do have some gis that come in all sorts of different colors such as gray, military green, navy, etc. make sure to check with your instructor on what colors your academy allows.

What if my Gi doesn't fit?

No problem, we have an industry leading 60-day return and exchange policy. Just send it back unused, and exchange it for the right size. If you need sizing help before or after your purchase, we are more than happy to help!

How many Gis should I own?

Depending on how often you train, having multiple Gis allows for a fresh Gi for every session. Most practitioners that train regularly will recommend having at least three.

Do BJJ Gis come with a belt?

Some of our starter gis and kids gis will come with a belt, but belts are not included with most gis as they represent your rank, which changes as you progress. Find belts for all ranks here.

How should I wash my BJJ Gi?

Wash your Gi after each session. Use gentle detergents and consider adding vinegar or baking soda to eliminate odors and bacteria. We always recommend that you wash on cool and hang dry.

Why Buy Your Gi From JiuJitsu.com?

Experience the best customer service and a wide selection of BJJ Gis tailored to meet the demands of all practitioners. With our easy sizing guide and hassle-free returns, you're guaranteed to find your perfect match. Plus, all of our staff members train and have worn every gi we sell - if you need a recommendation we'd be happy to help!
